overview: Junior has a new giant to faceâ€“a gadget-wielding advocate of materialism. Meanwhile, Celia is running for class president, Mom must cope with her inability as a scrapbooker, Dad keeps failing to install a wireless Internet connection, and Little Man has taken to scaling tall objects. For Junior to triumph, he must continue learning to follow the Spirit, and decide to lay up his treasures in heaven rather than on earth.
title: Junior's Giants: Envy Thou Not
